overview: Milkmen, mailmen, and plumbers get plenty of housewives hot, but only pizza delivery boys can satisfy the deepest carnal appetites of hungry gals. Brad is your typical All-American Stud who needs a little cash on the side- and gets more than he bargained for when he lands a job at the spiciest Italian eatery in town, "The Hot Oven."
tagline: Where something sizzling is always cooking!
title: Hot Oven
